SCTX - Script Source:
Scn fbmwMSFiremothQuestScript
short FiremothAtIsland
short sail
short Catfollow
short state

begin gamemode

;Local script on the sailor that checks local variable “sail” for warping the whole party to the island and back. 
;Does the checking for who’s alive and the coordinates they get warped to. 
;Sets variable "FiremothAtIsland" to 1 when at the island.




	if ( sail == 0 )
		return
	endif

;**********************************************************
;
;    warping!!!
;
;**********************************************************

;boat has been told to sail from dialogue (sailor sets sail to 1)
	if ( sail == 1 )

;the boat is at dock
		if ( FiremothAtIsland == 0 )	;the boat is at dock

;everyone to island
			if (GetDeadCount 0FiremothUSailor == 0 )
				fbmwFireMothSailorREF.PositionWorld -62789, -68350, 76, 126, WrldMorrowind
			endif

			if (GetDeadCount 0FiremothUWarrior == 0 )
				fbmwMFWarriorREF.PositionWorld -62550, -68662, 146, 57, WrldMorrowind
			endif

			if (GetDeadCount 0FiremothUArcher == 0 )
				fbmwFMArcherREF.PositionWorld -62634, -68808, 124, 46, WrldMorrowind
			endif

			if (GetDeadCount 0FiremothUMage == 0 )
				fbmwFMMageREF.PositionWorld  -62701, -68693, 119, 74, WrldMorrowind
			endif


			Player.PositionWorld -62501, -68693, 119, 74, WrldMorrowind
			Set GameHour to GameHour + 1

			fbmwFMBoatIslandREF.Enable
			fbmwFMBoatAtDockREF.Disable

			set FiremothAtIsland to 1
			fbmwFMMageREF.SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 1
			fbmwFMArcherREF.SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 1
			fbmwMFWarriorREF.SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 1
			fbmwFMMageREF.evp
			fbmwFMArcherREF.evp
			fbmwMFWarriorREF.evp
			fbmwFireMothSailorREF.evp

;sail back to Seyda Neen
		else
			if GetDeadCount 0FiremothUSailor == 0 
				fbmwFireMothSailorREF.PositionWorld -8992, -73041, 209, 331, WrldMorrowind
			endif

			if (GetDeadCount 0FiremothUWarrior == 0 )
				fbmwMFWarriorREF.PositionWorld -8115, -73335, 64, 268, WrldMorrowind
			endif	

			if (GetDeadCount 0FiremothUArcher == 0 )
				fbmwFMArcherREF.PositionWorld -8436, -73596, 123, 46, WrldMorrowind
			endif

			if (GetDeadCount 0FiremothUMage == 0 )
				fbmwFMMageREF.PositionWorld -8589, -73584, 93, 74, WrldMorrowind
			endif

			if (GetDeadCount 0firemothUcat == 0 ) && Catfollow == 1
				fbmwMSFMCatREF.PositionWorld -8589, -73596, 93, 74, WrldMorrowind
				set Catfollow to 0
			endif 

			Player.PositionWorld -9128, -73043, 209, 300, WrldMorrowind
			Set GameHour to GameHour + 1

			set FiremothAtIsland to 0
			fbmwFMMageREF.evp
			fbmwFMArcherREF.evp
			fbmwMFWarriorREF.evp
			fbmwFireMothSailorREF.evp
			fbmwMSFMCatREF.evp
			fbmwFMBoatIslandREF.Disable
			fbmwFMBoatAtDockREF.Enable

		endif

		set sail to 0

	endif

end
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 0 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
